readable.title: 3533484468_0787830d49
readable.content: A man is standing next to a woman and he is holding an electronic device to his ear . A man on a cellphone standing with a woman . A young couple in a busy city Couple talking and looking in same direction , man is using a cellphone and wearing a gray sweatshirt woman is wearing a black coat . Guy and girl in jackets while guy listens to mobile device
